title: The Writer's Almanac for Friday, January 28, 2022
description: It’s the birthday of Collette (1873) who said, "Sit down and put down everything that comes into your head and then you're a writer. But an author is one who can judge his own stuff's worth, without pity, and destroy most of it."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
